name: BadSanta
description:
You can download the exe from here (works a bit better):

 https://zoykz.itch.io/badsanta-beta-10

Created by Bad Idea Games:

Christina Baudais

Dylan Faim

Claire Vail

Chloe Versace

Assets Used:

Animations

  • All animations obtained from Mixamo.com: https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Models

  • 15 Low Poly Models: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/15-low-poly-models-202061
  • Christmas Gifts: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/christmas-gifts-52190
  • Christmas Toys: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/christmas-toys-106607
  • Cooking Assets: https://milkandbanana.itch.io/cooking-assets
  • Food Pack Mixed: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/food-pack-mixed-154349
  • Low Poly Cartoon House Interiors: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/low-poly-cartoon-house-interiors-167425
  • Low Poly Car: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/car-toon-the-sport-car-with-interior-62697#description
  • Low Poly Crates: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-crates-80037
  • Low Poly Fence Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/low-poly-fence-pack-61661
  • Low Poly Household Items: https://edlunn03.itch.io/low-poly-household-item-pack
  • Low Poly Tools: https://sjolle.itch.io/low-poly-tools
  • Low Poly Tree Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/low-poly-tree-pack-57866
  • Office Supplies Low Poly: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/office-supplies-low-poly-105519
  • Rallba’s Low Poly Room Pack: https://rallba.itch.io/rallbaslowpolyroompack
  • Simple Garage: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/interior/simple-garage-197251
  • Snowy Low Poly Trees: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/snowy-low-poly-trees-76796
  • VNB Christmas Mini Set: https://vnbp.itch.io/low-poly-xmas-mini-set-60-models-vnb-leo
  • VNP Low Poly 3D Office Set: https://vnbp.itch.io/low-poly-3d-office-set-vnb
  • VNB Low Poly Room Set: https://vnbp.itch.io/low-poly-home-set

Packages

  • Mesh Explosion: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/mesh-explosion-5471#description

Sound Effects

  • All sounds taken from https://freesound.org/
    • List of sounds at https://freesound.org/people/wildpaw132/bookmarks/
  • Music, Jingle Bells, taken from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aAfKVx5g1iE
